name: 附近公园

en-US.name: Nearby Park
en-US.description: A peaceful park suitable for walking.

description: 一个和平的公园，适合散步。

name: 迷雾森林

en-US.name: Misty Forest
en-US.description: A forest full of unknowns, may contain rare herbs.

description: 充满未知的森林，可能发现珍稀草药。

name: 赛博城区

en-US.name: Cyber City
en-US.description: A bustling but dangerous city, where opportunities and risks coexist.

description: 繁华但危险的都市，机遇与风险并存。

name: 古老遗迹

en-US.name: Ancient Ruins
en-US.description: Ruins sleeping for thousands of years, legend says ancient coins and golden feathers are buried here.

description: 沉睡千年的遗迹，传说埋藏着古币和金羽毛。

name: 星际空间站

en-US.name: Interstellar Space Station
en-US.description: Gateway to the universe, may have alien technology products.

description: 通往宇宙的门户，可能有外星科技产物。
